__e: I look to the stars and the answer is clear
I don't know what you are, the two of you, or where you're from, but I know that you consort with stars and magic, and think it fun.
I'll tell you about the stars and their relation to time.
There is no shame in wanting to be great or to reach higher. To... Walk on the moon.
But I will know what it's like to be out there among the stars.

I'd lie in the middle of the road, looking up at the stars, having conversations with people like you, trying to convince myself that killing them was a bad instinct and that sparing their lives was the right thing to do.
